dlls.name: SM-LuaConsole
dlls.description: A lua console for live execution of Lua code from a GUI in Scrap Mechanic

dlls.name: Networking Fix
dlls.author: QuestionableM, ColdMeekly
dlls.description: Stops Scrap Mechanic client from stalling packets. Fixes pretty much all the networking issues.

dlls.name: Proximity Voice Chat
dlls.author: QuestionableM
dlls.description: A Scrap Mechanic DLL mod which adds the Proximity Voice Chat into the game

dlls.name: Better Paint Tool
dlls.author: QuestionableM
dlls.description: A DLL mod for Scrap Mechanic which enhances the functionality of the vanilla Paint Tool and allows you to pick any color you want!

dlls.name: Dynamic Sun
dlls.author: QuestionableM
dlls.description: A Scrap Mechanic DLL mod which makes the sun dynamic by letting you adjust the angle!

dlls.name: Custom Audio Extensions
dlls.author: QuestionableM
dlls.description: A mod to add custom audio support for Scrap Mechanic workshop mods
